Reviews.Title: “great position, good price...”
Reviews.Author: yeshekathy
Reviews.Content: glamorous hotel rome price couldnt expect spot train bus walking distance main sites staff friendly helpful fine fridge ad aircon bathroom bed highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and friendly”
Reviews.Author: MargaretSimons
Reviews.Content: clean comfortable basic hotel lifted ordinary friendly helpful staff hotel moments walk railway station hand exit facing tracks laundrette cafes street wifi internet available foyer free historical rome easy walking distance hostess recommend walking tour followed enjoyed lot budget hotels building wed hotel criticism mattresses family bit uncomfortable springs close surface bit tight perfectly manageable overall value money

Reviews.Title: “Do NOT stay here!”
Reviews.Author: kmulrain1013
Reviews.Content: stayed night hotel spent days elevator holds 2 people owner doesnt understand english pay air conditioning television didnt phone activated probably couldve gotten top asleep stole friends purse including wallet camera passport nerve woke happened middle night security doors supposed locked headed downstairs leave hotel police owner tried blame saying left valuables bus metro didnt didnt upset happened hotel surveillance camera hallway didnt didnt feel safe beginning listened instinct pay little extra stay elsewhere

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Galli
HotelInfo.Address: Via Milazzo 20, 00185 Rome, Italy
